timeline.message: only run daily cron and manual trigger

timeline.bodyText: Let's remove these they add some noise, and we have a few cron workflows without the comments so lose some consistency.
timeline.author: anuraaga

timeline.bodyText: Don't need any of these comments they repeat the step names.
timeline.author: anuraaga
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+name: "Code Scanning - Action"
+
+on:
+  workflow_dispatch:
+  schedule:
+    #        ┌───────────── minute (0 - 59)
+    #        │  ┌───────────── hour (0 - 23)
+    #        │  │ ┌───────────── day of the month (1 - 31)
+    #        │  │ │ ┌───────────── month (1 - 12 or JAN-DEC)
+    #        │  │ │ │ ┌───────────── day of the week (0 - 6 or SUN-SAT)
+    #        │  │ │ │ │
+    #        │  │ │ │ │
+    #        │  │ │ │ │
+    #        *  * * * *
+    - cron: '30 1 * * *'
+
+jobs:
+  CodeQL-Build:
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+
+    steps:
+      - name: Checkout repository
+        uses: actions/checkout@v2
+
+      # Initializes the CodeQL tools for scanning.

timeline.bodyText: Incidentally not correct - so yeah don't need these comments :)
timeline.author: anuraaga
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+name: "Code Scanning - Action"
+
+on:
+  workflow_dispatch:
+  schedule:
+    #        ┌───────────── minute (0 - 59)
+    #        │  ┌───────────── hour (0 - 23)
+    #        │  │ ┌───────────── day of the month (1 - 31)
+    #        │  │ │ ┌───────────── month (1 - 12 or JAN-DEC)
+    #        │  │ │ │ ┌───────────── day of the week (0 - 6 or SUN-SAT)
+    #        │  │ │ │ │
+    #        │  │ │ │ │
+    #        │  │ │ │ │
+    #        *  * * * *
+    - cron: '30 1 * * *'
+
+jobs:
+  CodeQL-Build:
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+
+    steps:
+      - name: Checkout repository
+        uses: actions/checkout@v2
+
+      # Initializes the CodeQL tools for scanning.
+      - name: Initialize CodeQL
+        uses: github/codeql-action/init@v1
+        with:
+          languages: java
+
+      # Build the code
